intro.title: Why is it so great?
intro.body: I have designed a Material Design to make the web more beautiful and more user-friendly. Twitter has created a Bootstrap to support you in faster and easier development of responsive and effective websites. I present you a web app containing the best features of both of them - Material Design for Bootstrap.

about.title: about us
about.content:
I would like to give special thanks to the One Arab Million Coders who opened the gate for me to explore the world of web development and accomplish this result (Vue-Commerce).

Special thanks to Coretabs academy for the courses and advices given to assist me building this thing. I have done it on my own (self-learning). It still needs updates which I do work on this year and I am sure that I will produce a competitive content in the market soon.
about.nasr-quote: the equation is simple `Patience + passion = something big!`
about.yaser-job: Software Architect & Co-Founder at Coretabs Academy
about.yaser-quote: Did you solve the bug? or still there?
